sentences.english: They are anaerobic or microaerophilic, and are often found in hot springs or stagnant water.
sentences.chinese: 它们是厌氧生物，常被在硫磺泉或静水中找到。

sentences.english: The action of effluent recycle on an upflow anaerobic filter is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 出水回流对上流式厌氧滤器的影响非常复杂。

sentences.english: Currently, only a small percentage of U.S. dairies are equipped with anaerobic digesters.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，只有很少的美国牛奶场配置了厌氧消化器。

sentences.english: Granulation is the core technology in high-speed anaerobic reactors .
sentences.chinese: 污泥颗粒化是高效厌氧反应器的核心技术。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a dual-channel self-cycle anaerobic bioreactor.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种双通道自循环厌氧生物反应器。

sentences.english: The utilization of nitrite is not restricted by ammonia in the bacterium under both aerobic and anaerobic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 粪产碱菌在厌氧条件下还具有需硝酸盐的固氮酶活性。

sentences.english: Anaerobic ammonium oxidation(ANAMMOX)is an innovative process of biological nitrogen removal.
sentences.chinese: 厌氧氨氧化是一种全新的生物脱氮工艺。

sentences.english: The advantages of the anaerobic contact process are its easy management and wide application.
sentences.chinese: 厌氧接触法是一种管理方便应用广泛的厌氧处理工艺。

sentences.english: The advantages of the anaerobic contact process are its easy management and wide application.
sentences.chinese: 厌氧接触法是一种管理方便应用广泛的厌氧处理工艺。

sentences.english: Acetogenesis and hydrogen are an intermediate phase during the anaerobic digestion.
sentences.chinese: 产氢产酸是污泥厌氧消化过程中的一个中间阶段。

sentences.english: Disaggregated and whole anaerobic granules were taken as inoculum, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分别以解体和完好的厌氧颗粒污泥作为种泥进行培养。

sentences.english: It eradicates anaerobic bacteria and consequently washes them off your lips.
sentences.chinese: 它根除厌氧细菌，因此洗涤赶走你的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The effect of treatment of wet-blue waste water with the AFB is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 厌氧流化床反应器对蓝皮制革废水处理效果较好。

sentences.english: The anaerobic treatment of bagasse wastewater by a series of experiments is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对甘蔗渣喷淋废水进行了一系列的厌氧处理实验研究。

sentences.english: Anaerobic bio-reactor with shock wave can produce the methane in ambient temperature.
sentences.chinese: 激波厌氧反应器可在常温下成功实现产甲烷过程。

sentences.english: Fermentation is carried out anaerobically at a temperature below 20℃.
sentences.chinese: 发酵完成是在温度低于20℃厌氧条件下。
